article_title: Mitch McConnell criticized for taking money from firm tied to health website
article_text: U.S. Sen. Mitch McConnell is a vocal critic of the federal health care law, but he has accepted more than $75,000 in political donations since 2011 from the parent company of the firm that helped build and launch HealthCare.gov.
